title: Authors and Citation
text: Dimitri Tselenchuk. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Tselenchuk D (2025). LuminaTable: Beautiful Interactive Tables R Shiny. R package version 2.0.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {LuminaTable: Beautiful Interactive Tables for R and Shiny},   author = {Dimitri Tselenchuk},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 2.0.0}, }

title: LuminaTable
text: Beautiful, interactive tables R Shiny, powered lightweight custom renderer (LuminaEngine). Build Excel-inspired tables search, filters, sorting, pagination scrolling, downloads, sparklines, conditional formatting, performance-minded virtualization.

title: LuminaTable
text: Use remotes/devtools install GitHub: local development (repo):
code: install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("drknowhow/LuminaTable") source("install_package.R")  # builds, documents, installs from source

title: LuminaTable
code: library(LuminaTable)  lumina(iris) |>     opt_search(filters = TRUE) |>     opt_pagination(scroller = TRUE, showSummary = TRUE) |>     opt_buttons(         columnView = list(enabled = TRUE, position = "top"),         downloads  = list(enabled = TRUE, formats = c("csv", "json", "xlsx"))     ) |>     opt_layout(compact = TRUE, fontSize = "13px")

title: LuminaTable
text: Search + per-column filters optional text highlighting Sorting, pagination scroll mode sticky headers/footers Column visibility toggle download buttons (csv/json/xlsx) Row selection reset, hide/unhide, Shiny output binding Conditional formatting rules (cell row) plus inline heatmaps Sparklines (lines/bars) compact visuals inside cells Performance options: debounced inputs, animation toggle, scroller preference, virtualization windowing, server-side short-circuits

title: LuminaTable
code: library(shiny) library(LuminaTable)  ui <- fluidPage(     luminaOutput("tbl", height = "500px") )  server <- function(input, output, session) {     output$tbl <- renderLumina(         lumina(mtcars) |>             opt_search(filters = TRUE) |>             opt_selection(enabled = TRUE, mode = "multiple", reset = TRUE) |>             opt_pagination(scroller = TRUE)     ) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: LuminaTable
code: lumina(mtcars) |>     opt_heatmap(columns = c("mpg", "hp"), palette = c("#f7fbff", "#6baed6", "#08306b")) |>     opt_condformat(         list(column = "mpg", op = "gt", value = 25, target = "row",                  style = list(bg = "#fff3e0", fontWeight = "bold"))     )

title: LuminaTable
code: lumina(mtcars) |>     opt_performance(         debounceSearchMs   = 150,         debounceFiltersMs  = 150,         disableAnimations  = TRUE,         preferScroller     = TRUE,         virtualization     = TRUE,         virtualizationBuffer = 8,         serverSide         = FALSE  # set TRUE when data is pre-filtered server-side     )

title: LuminaTable
text: repo root:
code: shiny::runApp('.', host = '127.0.0.1', port = 8000)

title: LuminaTable
text: MIT License (see LICENSE).

what: Add a Sparkline to a Column — add_sparkline
title: Add a Sparkline to a Column — add_sparkline
text: Add Sparkline Column

title: Add a Sparkline to a Column — add_sparkline
code: add_sparkline(lumina_obj, col, color = "#6200ea")

title: Add a Sparkline to a Column — add_sparkline
text: lumina_obj lumina widget col column name containing numeric data color hex color bars

what: Lumina Table Output for Shiny — lumina-shiny
title: Lumina Table Output for Shiny — lumina-shiny
text: Lumina Table Output Shiny

title: Lumina Table Output for Shiny — lumina-shiny
code: luminaOutput(outputId, width = "100%", height = "auto")  renderLumina(expr, env = parent.frame(), quoted = FALSE)

title: Lumina Table Output for Shiny — lumina-shiny
text: outputId Output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates lumina table env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable.

title: Create a Lumina Table — lumina
text: Create Lumina Table

title: Create a Lumina Table — lumina
code: lumina(   data,   width = "100%",   height = NULL,   elementId = NULL,   maximizable = TRUE,   minimizable = TRUE,   sortable = TRUE,   colHide = FALSE,   title = NULL,   caption = NULL )

title: Create a Lumina Table — lumina
text: data data.frame tibble width CSS width height CSS height elementId Optional ID maximizable Logical. Enable fullscreen expand button top-right corner? minimizable Logical. Enable minimize button collapse table smooth animation? sortable Logical. Enable column sorting? Click ascending, twice descending, three times restore original order. colHide Logical. Show eye icon column header hide/show columns? works column toggle dropdown enabled via opt_buttons(). title Character. Optional title displayed table. caption Character. Optional caption displayed table.

title: Configure Action Buttons — opt_buttons
text: Configure button features column visibility toggle data downloads. Accepts list-based structure flexible configuration.

title: Configure Action Buttons — opt_buttons
code: opt_buttons(w, ...)

title: Configure Action Buttons — opt_buttons
text: w lumina widget ... Named lists defining button configurations: columnView: List enabled, position, visibleColumns downloads: List enabled, filename, formats (csv, json, xlsx)

title: Configure Action Buttons — opt_buttons
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ lumina(mtcars) |>   opt_buttons(     columnView = list(enabled = TRUE, position = "top"),     downloads = list(enabled = TRUE, filename = "data", formats = c("csv", "json", "xlsx"))   ) } # }

title: Configure Conditional Formatting — opt_condformat
text: Define conditional formatting rules evaluated browser. rule targets column applies style condition met.

title: Configure Conditional Formatting — opt_condformat
code: opt_condformat(w, ..., rules = NULL, edit = FALSE)

title: Configure Conditional Formatting — opt_condformat
text: w lumina widget ... Rule definitions lists. rule can include: column: Column name target (required) op: Comparison operator. One "gt", "gte", "lt", "lte", "eq", "neq", "", "contains", "". Default: "eq". value: Single value comparisons (numeric character). , use range length-2 vector. , use values. range: Length-2 numeric vector operator. values: Vector values operator. target: "cell" (default) "row" apply styles entire row. style: List CSS styles, e.g. list(bg="#fff3e0", color="#e65100", fontWeight="bold", textDecoration="underline", border="1px solid #e0e0e0", class="-custom-class"). rules Optional list rules (useful already assembled). omitted, rules built ....

what: Configure Column Filters (Deprecated - use opt_search instead) — opt_filters
title: Configure Column Filters (Deprecated - use opt_search instead) — opt_filters
text: Configure Column Filters (Deprecated - use opt_search instead)

title: Configure Column Filters (Deprecated - use opt_search instead) — opt_filters
code: opt_filters(w, enabled = TRUE, highlight = TRUE)

title: Configure Column Filters (Deprecated - use opt_search instead) — opt_filters
text: w lumina widget enabled Logical. Enable disable column filters. highlight Logical. Highlight matched text search results?

what: Apply a heatmap to table cells — opt_heatmap
title: Apply a heatmap to table cells — opt_heatmap
text: Colors specified numeric columns using low→high gradient. heatmap applied directly table cells (separate block).

title: Apply a heatmap to table cells — opt_heatmap
code: opt_heatmap(w, columns, palette = c("#f7fbff", "#6baed6", "#08306b"))

title: Apply a heatmap to table cells — opt_heatmap
text: w lumina widget columns Character vector column names heatmap. Must numeric data. palette Character vector 2-5 hex colors used linear gradient (low → high).

what: Configure Table Layout and Appearance — opt_layout
title: Configure Table Layout and Appearance — opt_layout
text: Control various layout aspects table including dimensions, spacing, borders, visual styling.

title: Configure Table Layout and Appearance — opt_layout
code: opt_layout(   w,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   maxHeight = NULL,   striped = TRUE,   bordered = TRUE,   borderStyle = "solid",   compact = FALSE,   hover = TRUE,   fontSize = NULL,   headerHeight = NULL,   rowHeight = NULL,   cellPadding = NULL,   cornerRadius = NULL,   shadow = FALSE,   shadowSize = "medium",   headerSticky = TRUE,   footerSticky = FALSE,   wrapText = TRUE,   textAlign = "left",   headerAlign = NULL,   headerBgColor = NULL,   headerColor = NULL,   headerFontWeight = NULL,   headerFontSize = NULL,   verticalAlign = "middle",   animation = TRUE,   animationDuration = "0.3s" )

title: Configure Table Layout and Appearance — opt_layout
text: w lumina widget width Character. CSS width table container (e.g., "100%", "800px", "auto"). Default: NULL (uses widget width). height Character. CSS height table container (e.g., "500px", "auto"). Default: NULL. maxHeight Character. Maximum height scrolling (e.g., "600px"). Default: NULL. striped Logical. Enable alternating row colors (zebra striping). Default: TRUE. bordered Logical. Show borders around cells. Default: TRUE. borderStyle Character. Border style: "solid", "none", "light", "heavy". Default: "solid". compact Logical. Use compact spacing (reduced padding). Default: FALSE. hover Logical. Highlight rows hover. Default: TRUE. fontSize Character. Base font size (e.g., "14px", "0.9rem", "small", "medium", "large"). Default: NULL (theme default). headerHeight Character. Height header row (e.g., "45px", "auto"). Default: NULL (theme default). rowHeight Character. Height data rows (e.g., "40px", "auto"). Default: NULL (theme default). cellPadding Character. Padding inside cells (e.g., "8px", "0.5rem"). Default: NULL (theme default). cornerRadius Character. Border radius rounded corners (e.g., "8px", "0"). Default: NULL (theme default). shadow Logical. Add shadow effect table container. Default: FALSE. shadowSize Character. Shadow size: "none", "small", "medium", "large". Default: "medium". headerSticky Logical. Make header row sticky scroll. Default: TRUE. footerSticky Logical. Make footer (pagination) sticky scroll. Default: FALSE. wrapText Logical. Wrap text cells instead truncating. Default: TRUE. textAlign Character. Default text alignment: "left", "center", "right". Default: "left". headerAlign Character. Header text alignment: "left", "center", "right". Default: NULL (inherits textAlign). headerBgColor Character. Header background color (e.g., "#f0f0f0", "lightgray"). Default: NULL (theme default). headerColor Character. Header text color (e.g., "#333333", "darkblue"). Default: NULL (theme default). headerFontWeight Character. Header font weight: "normal", "bold", "600", "700". Default: NULL (theme default). headerFontSize Character. Header font size (e.g., "13px", "12pt"). Default: NULL (theme default). verticalAlign Character. Vertical alignment: "top", "middle", "bottom". Default: "middle". animation Logical. Enable smooth animations interactions. Default: TRUE. animationDuration Character. Duration animations (e.g., "0.3s", "200ms"). Default: "0.3s".

title: Configure Table Layout and Appearance — opt_layout
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ lumina(mtcars) |>   opt_layout(     striped = TRUE,     compact = TRUE,     fontSize = "13px",     cornerRadius = "12px",     shadow = TRUE,     headerBgColor = "#e8e8e8",     headerColor = "#333",     headerFontWeight = "bold"   )    # Minimal layout lumina(iris) |>   opt_layout(     bordered = FALSE,     striped = FALSE,     shadow = FALSE,     borderStyle = "none"   )    # Dense data layout with custom header lumina(mtcars) |>   opt_layout(     compact = TRUE,     fontSize = "12px",     rowHeight = "32px",     cellPadding = "4px",     headerAlign = "center",     headerFontSize = "13px",     headerFontWeight = "bold"   ) } # }

title: Configure Pagination — opt_pagination
text: Configure Pagination

title: Configure Pagination — opt_pagination
code: opt_pagination(   w,   enabled = TRUE,   pageSize = 10,   pageSizeOptions = c(10, 25, 50, 100),   scroller = FALSE,   showSummary = TRUE )

title: Configure Pagination — opt_pagination
text: w lumina widget enabled Logical. Enable disable pagination. pageSize Numeric. number rows per page. pageSizeOptions Numeric vector. options rows per page dropdown. scroller Logical. Use scroller instead pagination? showSummary Logical. Show hide "Showing X Y Z results" text.

title: Performance tuning options — opt_performance
text: Configure client-side performance tweaks debounced search animation disable.

title: Performance tuning options — opt_performance
code: opt_performance(   w,   debounceSearchMs = 150,   debounceFiltersMs = 150,   disableAnimations = FALSE,   preferScroller = FALSE,   virtualization = FALSE,   virtualizationBuffer = 8,   serverSide = FALSE,   disableHtml = FALSE,   disableHighlight = FALSE )

title: Performance tuning options — opt_performance
text: w lumina widget debounceSearchMs Numeric. Milliseconds debounce search input (0 disable). Default 150ms. debounceFiltersMs Numeric. Milliseconds debounce column filter inputs (0 disable). Default 150ms. disableAnimations Logical. Disable row/transition animations large tables. Default FALSE. preferScroller Logical. Prefer scroller mode paged mode pagination enabled. Default FALSE. virtualization Logical. Enable row windowing/virtualization scroller mode . Default FALSE. virtualizationBuffer Integer. Extra rows render /viewport virtualization . Default 8. serverSide Logical. Assume paging/search/filtering handled server-side; skip client processing. Default FALSE. disableHtml Logical. Treat columns plain text (ignore htmlCols) reduce DOM cost. Default FALSE. disableHighlight Logical. Disable search/filter highlighting save render time. Default FALSE.

title: Configure Search and Filters — opt_search
text: Configure Search Filters

title: Configure Search and Filters — opt_search
code: opt_search(   w,   show = TRUE,   highlight = TRUE,   position = "right",   filters = FALSE,   filtersHighlight = TRUE )

title: Configure Search and Filters — opt_search
text: w lumina widget show Logical. Show hide global search bar? highlight Logical. Highlight matched text search results? position Character. Position search bar: "left", "right", "top", "bottom". filters Logical. Enable disable per-column filters? filtersHighlight Logical. Highlight matched text column filter results?

title: Configure Row Selection — opt_selection
text: Configure Row Selection

title: Configure Row Selection — opt_selection
code: opt_selection(w, enabled = TRUE, mode = "single", reset = FALSE)

title: Configure Row Selection — opt_selection
text: w lumina widget enabled Logical. Enable disable row selection. mode Character. Selection mode: "single" "multiple". reset Logical. Show reset button?

title: Set Table Theme — set_theme
text: Set Table Theme

title: Set Table Theme — set_theme
code: set_theme(w, theme = "default")

title: Set Table Theme — set_theme
text: w lumina widget theme Name theme

title: Generate SVG Sparkline String — spark_bar
text: Helper function convert numbers HTML bars

title: Generate SVG Sparkline String — spark_bar
code: spark_bar(x, color = "#6200ea")

title: Generate SVG Sparkline String — spark_bar
text: x numeric vector
